channel.title: Year 9: Drama Questions
channel.description:
Okay this is pretty basic but I have alot of other homework to do today.
Allright what I have to do is make a play with my group which I have done. But I am playing a clingy girlfriend (even know im a guy). I need some questions to ask my boyfriend in the play. Because he has killed someone and is a lifeguard... here is an example one:
1. Where were you last night? I called you but you didn't pick up.
You see it is improvisation. And the person playing the boyfriend doesn't know what questions i'm asking so I have to ask questions that will be hard for them to answer. They have to be fairly different to the one I have stated below.
Thanks it would be greatly appriciated.
~Zandia

item.title: Year 9: Drama Questions
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

Honey, I called you… Why did you not pickup… Where you cheating on me???

Read full topic

item.title: Year 9: Drama Questions
item.dc:creator: @SantaClause SantaClause
item.description:
@SantaClause wrote:

I wanted to have an orgasm but you didn’t pick up! Now what am I supposed to do?! I missed a period!

Read full topic

item.title: Year 9: Drama Questions
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

If you aren’t aloud to say “Fuck” I suggest you ask why, if it’s Drama and you’re spoused to be clingy and he’s a lifeguard, you’d obviously be over 18 and everyone over 13 swears at least once in there life time.

Read full topic

item.title: Year 9: Drama Questions
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Mrquarter:

3. Honeykins, why the fuck didn’t you answer the damn phone?

that right there was awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Year 9: Drama Questions
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

  1. What were you doing on the night of insert date here?

  2. Why didn’t you call me?

  3. Honeykins, why the fuck didn’t you answer the damn phone?

Read full topic

Okay this is pretty basic but I have alot of other homework to do today.

Allright what I have to do is make a play with my group which I have done. But I am playing a clingy girlfriend (even know im a guy).
I need some questions to ask my boyfriend in the play. Because he has killed someone and is a lifeguard… here is an example one:

You see it is improvisation. And the person playing the boyfriend doesn’t know what questions i’m asking so I have to ask questions that will be hard for them to answer. They have to be fairly different to the one I have stated below.
